summary: Utility module that offers a collection of helper functions for managing model parameters and tensors across heterogeneous devices, calculating memory requirements, handling offloaded weights, detecting and re‑tying tied parameters, and loading checkpoints with automatic device mapping in the Accelerate framework.
business_intent: Facilitate large‑scale model training and inference by automating device placement, memory optimization, offloading, and checkpoint handling, thereby improving performance and scalability on diverse hardware.
